definition: suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 右邊|右边[you4 bian5]

sentences.english: If there is only one deacon , he takes his place at the right of the celebrant.
sentences.chinese: 如果只有一个执事，他考虑他的位置在右边的礼。

sentences.english: Up there on the right, you can see the gardens.
sentences.chinese: 在您的右边，您可以看到花园。

sentences.english: Why is 2 the bottom and not the rightmost vertex?
sentences.chinese: 为什么2是底部数而不最右边的顶点数呢？

sentences.english: It's down Bridge Street on the right.
sentences.chinese: 它就在大桥街的路右边。

sentences.english: Shea filled in for Brown at right-back.
sentences.chinese: 奥谢则填补了布朗右边的空缺。

sentences.english: The picture on the right shows its size against a thumb.
sentences.chinese: 右边图片将它的大小和一个拇指进行了对比。

sentences.english: "right" table, which appears rightmost in the JOIN clause are included.
sentences.chinese: 第二张表即右表，出现在JOIN子句的最右边的。

sentences.english: Route carpeted floor in the right footwell.
sentences.chinese: 布置右边脚坑里的铺地毯地板。

sentences.english: Length of days is in her right hand, and in her left hand riches and glory.
sentences.chinese: 在她右边是延年益寿，在她左边是富贵荣华。

sentences.english: The maenad on the right is playing a tambourine.
sentences.chinese: 而神像右边的女祭司正演奏著小手鼓。

sentences.english: The right-hand pane is where all the work is done.
sentences.chinese: 右边显示的是所有制作好的图标。

sentences.english: I put full regular and full right rudder in to try and keep the plane from spinning out of control.
sentences.chinese: 我把方向舵全打向右边，试图结束飞机的失控。

sentences.english: AAre you kidding? Don't you see many people over there? Just on your right.
sentences.chinese: 你开玩笑吧？你没看见那里有很多人吗？就在你右边。

sentences.english: To that building's right is Sun Dorm or girl's dorm.
sentences.chinese: 科学系大楼的右边是女生宿舍，也叫太阳宿舍。

sentences.english: To the right were eight tall porcelain urinals.
sentences.chinese: 右边是八个高大的陶瓷小便器。

sentences.english: The bundle sticking out on the right are the optical tracts, leading to the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 右边伸出的一束是视觉传导束，它通向眼睛。

definition: left/the left side/to the left of
